intro.name: James Bridenthal
intro.blurb: Full stack developer focusing on .Net web api's, various UI libraries, and Azure services. I am always looking to learn about new technologies, developing new skills and using the right tools that best suites the needs of the client.

skills.skill: 10+ years .Net Frameworks using C#, VB.Net, Standard Framework, .Net Core
Experience using front end UI technologies in Angular, React, Blazor, Astro
Experience using various database both relational and no-sql in Microsft SQL, CosmosDB, MySql, PostGRES, MongoDB

workHistory.title: Senior Software Engineer V
bullets: Architect, build, and integrate legacy affordable and public housing applications adhering them to government guidelines while interacting with government API's
Full stack development using Angular, Javascript, C# and other .Net technologies.
Develop a test suite using SpecFlow and nunit to run integration tests against functionality and workflows
Participate in client meetings to better understand their needs and ideas for the product
Maintain legacy application developed in Powerbuilder and SQL including dev ops for CI/CD
Mentor junior developers on practices and processes
Accomplished saving clients from leaving our product to a competitor with a proof of concept to production enhancement.
Starting stages of gaining exposure to Azure for CI/CD and AI development
Manage summer interns and health check project using Playwright, C# and Azure technologies to help ensure core product meets standards for quality product.
